title: The offer to lend not a compulsion to borrow, says Verité chief
byline: Dr. Nishan de Mel, Executive Director of Verité Research has urged the government to evaluate the “hidden costs” of the IMF’s Rapid Financing Instrument (RFI) before committing to the debt.

title: Sri Lanka Customs initiates major technological overhaul of its vehicle clearance protocols
byline: Sri Lanka Customs has initiated a major technological overhaul of its vehicle clearance protocols to seal a loophole that previously allowed the tampering of motor vehicle data during registration.
